articles.description: When consuming green chillies, it's important to keep in mind that they can cause irritation and discomfort in some individuals, especially those with sensitive stomachs or gastrointestinal issues.
articles.content: We all love a hint of spice in our food, isn’t it? In fact, many Indian dishes are famous for being spicy. But turns out, one of the spiciest ingredients used in Indian kitchens — green chilli — not … [+3327 chars]
